name: UXsniff AI-powered Heatmaps and Session Recordings
author: UX Sniff

sections.description:
A simple WordPress heatmap plugin to monitoring your user’s behaviour, detect and report abnormal user activities. This plugin allows you to install UXsniff tracking code to your wordpress without editing your theme.

The plugin also shows basic statistic about your website. Some basic features such as Heatmaps, Clickmaps, Session Recordings and Rage alerts are available within the plugin. Login to UXsniff for advanced features such as user journey, feedback widgets, on-site surveys, broken link scanner, site audit and advanced reports.

Plugin Features

  • Insert UXsniff tracking code
  • Report abnormal user activities
  • Heatmaps
  • Clickmaps
  • Session recordings
  • Rage alerts

Advanced Features (available on uxsniff.com for free)

  • Real-time monitoring
  • GPT summaries for session recordings
  • Wayback machine for heatmaps (time travel to old designs)
  • Feedback widgets
  • On-site surveys
  • LinkGuard – broken links scanner
  • Site audit – scan your site for UX and SEO issues
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

After active plugin go to UX Sniff->Settings to setup your tracker.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Inital release

1.0.1

  • Removed font-awesome library to reduce the plugin file size

1.0.2

  • Added New feature – Element Inspector

1.0.3

  • Element and URL Inspector are now available within the plugin

1.0.4

  • Heatmaps is now available within the plugin

1.0.5

  • Rearranged sub menus

1.0.6

  • Rage Alerts and Realtime bug fixes

1.0.7

  • Resolve bug: https://wordpress.org/support/topic/bug-cant-delete-wp-users/

1.0.8

  • Removed realtime and element inspector in the plugin. Features still available on UXsniff platform.

1.0.9

  • Update readme and description

1.1.0

  • Fixed missing dashicon logo and some PHP notices

1.1.1

  • Fixed css bugs

1.1.2

  • Added Clickmaps and plan info.

1.1.3

  • Improved API key verification. (Manual edit domain name for staging)

1.1.4

  • Added session recordings.

1.1.5

  • Added session recordings caching.

1.1.6

  • Fixed API Key Validation bug.

1.1.7

  • Updated latest tracking snippet.

1.1.8

  • Updated latest tracking snippet and some bug fixes.

1.1.9

  • Updated readme.txt, screenshots and advanced features on UXsniff.

1.2.0

  • Updated readme.txt, screenshots and advanced features on UXsniff.

1.2.1

  • Updated readme.txt, screenshots and advanced features on UXsniff. Improved API key matching using file_get_contents, curl and open as fallbacks.

1.2.2

  • Added blueprint.json

1.2.3

  • Replaced Curl and file_get_content to wp_remote_get

1.2.4

  • Updated license and short description
